item.title: Manhole cover it's loose and moves when cars are going over, 11th December
item.description:
This is a manhloe that needs checking as the cover moves every time a car is passing over. The road is heavily circulated by busses and trucks and might become a hazard if not addressed urgently. Noticed issue for about a week. Postcode N20 0SG
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 403, Oakleigh Road North, Brunswick Park, Greater London

item.title: Mattress and headboard dumped on Slade stairs up to roundabout, 11th December
item.description:

item.title: Road closed for no obvious reason, 11th December
item.description:
The top end of Queens Road (junction with Beckenham Road) has been closed without notice or explanation for the last two weeks. There appears to be some minor works on the opposite pavement of Beckenham Road, albeit I have yet to see anyone actually doing any work there and I cannot understand why this means our road needs to be closed. Can you please explain what works are being done, over what timeframe and why this means are road needs to be closed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Queens Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights
